  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    The Product class stored in Stock

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Product

        public Product(java.lang.String name,
               double price,
               int numStock)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        参数:
        name - The name of the product
        price - The price of the product
        numStock - The number of the product in stock.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public int orderReceived()
        Receive the order and update numOrdered and numStock.
        返回:
        the number of stock after order completed.

        Get the total value of the product.

        Sell ONE product.
        返回:
        Boolean If sell succeed.

        Get the number of ordered product.
